name: Youtube - Bigger Player Sizes
description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

This is just a simple style for: http://youtube.com

Note: This is NOT a SKIN!

Objective: Make both sizes of the player bigger!

--- No screens, sorry, but try it you may like it ---
additional_info:
########## (v0.060) ##########
- YouTube changed the code again, and this time i could not find a difference to resize the two player sizes separately so it just have one size 720p optimized, at least for now.

########## (v0.050) ##########
- Fixed and working with both players, Flash and HTML5.

########## (v0.030) ##########
- 1st public release.
- Small size of player it's now optimized for 480p instead of 360p.
- Medium size of player it's now optimized for 720p instead of 480p. (Since the player is now 1280 pixels wide, a resolution bigger than that is advised to use the medium size of the player, if you have a resolution of 1280 pixels or even smaller just use the full screen size.)

--------------------------------------------------
Some features and things you may like to know...
- This script intented only to resize the defaults player sizes, no other unnecessarily change was made.
- To finish, yes i know it could be a bit better than what it is, but sincerely i don't wanted spend more time with it!
--------------------------------------------------
